World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 4 日星期一 20:09:07 GMT 120
As Gaza's hunger crisis worsens, emaciated children seen at hospitalsTwo Palestinian toddlers with sunken eyes and emaciated faces, one in a yellow cardigan and the other in a stripy top, were lying side by side on a bed in a Gaza clinic, their thin, bony legs protruding from diapers that looked too big for them. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 19:15:59 GMT 5DUC3MQ6AJPOZM47ADWF6I4HYM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gazas-hunger-crisis-worsens-emacied-children-seen-hospitals-2024-03-04/Bassam Masoud, Mohammed Salem世界中东
UN team says rape, gang rape likely occurred during Hamas attack on IsraelA team of United Nations experts reported on Monday that there were "reasonable grounds to believe" sexual violence, including rape and gang rape, occurred at several locations during the Oct. 7 attack on Israel by Hamas militants. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 19:05:23 GMT 53L2TITRBVMBZFJUUGOZV7T36E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-team-says-rape-gang-rape-likely-occurred-during-hamas-attack-israel-2024-03-04/Michelle Nichols世界中东
UK plan to deport asylum seekers to Rwanda suffers first parliamentary defeatsBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak suffered his first defeats over his legislation to send asylum seekers to Rwanda after the upper house of parliament demanded greater protections to be introduced before deportation flights can take off. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 18:57:04 GMT 3TLD45J5ORP7PDGDUCQFM62CQE https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-plan-deport-asylum-seekers-rwanda-suffers-first-parliamentary-defeats-2024-03-04/Andrew Macaskill世界英国
Israel: Over 450 UN aid agency employees in Gaza are 'military operatives'Israel's military spokesperson said on Monday the UN aid agency UNRWA in Gaza employed over 450 "military operatives" from Hamas and other armed groups, and that Israel has shared this intelligence with the United Nations. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 18:52:30 GMT NFHZJZR24RO2RNYM3JOVGLIFLU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-over-450-un-aid-agency-employees-gaza-are-military-operatives-2024-03-04/Reuters世界中东
EU disburses 150 mln euros to Tunisia to support financial stabilityThe European Union disbursed on Monday 150 million euros to Tunisia as budget support for financial stability and economic reforms, the European Commission said, as the North Africa country faces financial crisis. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 18:43:06 GMT LLP7VCXGH5NTFAIX5RORLIPLGM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/eu-disburses-150-mln-euros-tunisia-support-financial-stability-2024-03-04/Reuters世界非洲
Explainer: Why a leaked German military recording is causing outcryRussian media last week published an 38-minute audio recording of an intercepted online call between senior German military officials about how to support Ukraine against the Kremlin's invasion. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 18:39:24 GMT LJHNJVKWGFK5LKWQJCH3CS2NPA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/why-leaked-german-military-recording-is-causing-outcry-2024-03-04/Sarah Marsh, Andreas Rinke世界欧洲
Israeli strike kills three Lebanese rescue workers from Hezbollah-linked forceAn Israeli strike on Monday on a civil defence centre in southern Lebanon killed three emergency workers from a force affiliated with Hezbollah, the government said. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 18:33:03 GMT N3QYUFD3SBIIRB55TMM7JNJZBU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-strike-kills-三-lebanese-rescue-workers-hezbollah-linked-force-2024-03-04/Reuters世界中东
EU aims to shift European arms industry to ‘war economy mode’The European Commission will propose on Tuesday ways for the European Union to boost its arms industry so it can shift to "war economy mode" in response to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 18:21:36 GMT NHOFPIES5BNGLJXVNJUIJFISB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-aims-shift-european-arms-industry-war-economy-mode-2024-03-04/Andrew Gray世界欧洲
Gambian parliament to discuss bill to decriminalise female genital mutilationA bill seeking to repeal Gambia's ban on female genital mutilation (FGM) was presented in the West African country's parliament on Monday and will be discussed by lawmakers later this month. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 18:05:13 GMT SM3CKIXABNK73ALTZRWGRKSIYA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/gambian-parliament-discuss-bill-decriminalise-female-genital-mutilation-2024-03-04/Reuters世界非洲
Israel says UN trying to keep quiet on report about Hamas sexual attacksIsrael's foreign minister said on Monday he has recalled the country's UN ambassador for consultation over alleged UN attempts to keep quiet a report on sexual violence perpetrated by Hamas. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 18:03:24 GMT REHDDETYGZNMXFHWF4AGJJEC3FI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-says-un-trying-keep-quiet-report-about-hamas- Sex-attacks-2024-03-04/Reuters世界中东
US issues fresh curbs on Zimbabwe president, others; terminates sanctions programThe United States on Monday terminated a Zimbabwe sanctions program and reimposed curbs on nine people and three entities, including the country's president, over their alleged involvement in corruption or serious human rights abuse. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 16:55:56 GMT 63ID4ZCEZBJ23MV3RPFCXLPXGU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-issues-fresh-curbs-zimbabwe-president-others-terminates-sanctions-program-2024-03-04/Reuters世界
